text: Dakara arrā no michi no tame ni tatakae. Anata (muhanmado) wa, jibun ni taishite dake, seme o owasa rete iru noda. Shinja-tachi o gekirei shi nasai. Osoraku arrā wa, shinkō shinai-sha-tachi no sen'i o yokushi sa reyou. Arrā no buyū wa nani mono yori mo sugure, sono batsu mo haruka ni kibishī nodearu
